attributes.action: Stop councils deliberately phasing traffic lights to trap cars in box junctions
attributes.additional_details: This is prevalent throughout the UK and used as an easy way of revenue grabbing
attributes.background: Force councils to stop this practice

rejection.details:
Decisions about local traffic measures are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
